p: The proportion of different parasite stages in each bulk sample was estimated using CIBERSORTx ( Newman et al., 2019). A signature matrix was built using P. falciparum ookinete, gametocyte and asexual scRNA-seq data from ( Reid et al., 2018; Real et al., 2020). Cell fractions in each bulk sample were imputed based on 100 permutations.
